params._collateralDelta: collateral delta which is being withdrawn
params._indexToken: index token which is being sold
params._isLong: is long if true, short if false
params._minOut: minimum amount of tokens to receive
params._path: path to swap, one of the tokens must be the index token
params._sizeDelta: size delta which is being withdrawn
params._withdrawETH: withdraw ETH if true, otherwise withdraw ERC20

params._orderIndex: order index which is being liquidated
params._updateData: data to update which is being liquidated
